md:
giải nghĩa từ "texture" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Texture (noun)

* Meaning: The feel or appearance of a surface or a material.
* Example sentence: The texture of the carpet was soft and smooth.
* Related words: rough, smooth, coarse, fine, silky, velvety.

Texture (verb)

* Meaning: To give a surface or material a particular feel or appearance.
* Example sentence: The designer textured the fabric to give it a more interesting look.
* Related words: smooth, roughen, polish, refine.

In computer graphics, texture refers to a 2D image or pattern that is mapped onto a 3D object to give it a more realistic appearance.

* Example sentence: The game designer added a texture to the 3D model to make it look more realistic.
* Related words: mapping, rendering, 3D modeling, graphics.

In cooking, texture refers to the feel or consistency of food.

* Example sentence: The chef added some crunchy texture to the salad with toasted nuts.
* Related words: crispy, crunchy, soft, chewy, tender.

In psychology, texture can refer to the emotional tone or atmosphere of a situation or experience.

* Example sentence: The texture of the conversation was tense and uncomfortable.
* Related words: mood, atmosphere, tone, feeling, ambiance.

In general, texture can refer to any quality or characteristic that gives something a particular feel or appearance.

* Example sentence: The texture of the music was haunting and evocative.
* Related words: tone, quality, character, feel, atmosphere.
